https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/arrow.html

Normally it just works. You don't have to think too much. At most, you might want to tweak the schema. Here's how that works. 

But sometimes you run into edge cases. Other times you just want a deeper understanding of what's going on. So let's take a look inside
